subject: Must have medications
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
Can generic drugs be cheap? Sure, but only if they come from Canada. CanadianPharmacy offers you to save large without having to put your health in danger. Huge choice of qualitative generic drugs offered at the lowest prices imaginable only at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the easiest and the cheapest way to take care of your health.
Sincerely yours,Estelle Dawson
